data.name: Wicked Island
data.detailed_description:
Adult open world survival with sex defeat system.
Combat horny monsters, craft your gear, customize your character, unlock pet monsters and upgrade them for more sex animations.



* Detailed sex scenes with free camera mode

* Gather resources to survive and craft better gear

* Combat your way through a large open world

* Unlock and upgrade monsters to fuck at will


List of features
Detailed sex animations with different monsters
Sex defeat system (optional)
Pregnancy with explicit birth (optional)
Futa NPC's (optional)
Cum inflation (optional)
Get ambushed while sleeping
Unlock monster system for revisiting your favourite animations at will
Extensive character customization
Action based combat (dodge, dash, double-jump)
Resource gathering and crafting
Player home with ability to build
Open world with dungeons, caves, ruins, different biomes etc
Day/night cycle
Dynamic Weather









This game is still in development, please add to your wishlist and join or Discord server!
https://discord.gg/v5uJxVJYvy

data.short_description: Adult open world survival with sex defeat system, pregnancy, ambushes and much more. Combat horny monsters, craft and upgrade your gear, customize your character, unlock pet monsters and upgrade them for more sex animations. Fight your way trough dungeons, caves, ruins and across the map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core cpu
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050/AMD 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core cpu
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080/AMD V64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Wicked Island is a real-time 3D game with explicit sexual content intended for adults only.
	- Explicit nudity
	- Consensual and forced sex scenes with fictional humanoid creatures and humans
	- All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
